comments.body: Can we leave a TODO comment here to augment the settings for both the append-only and mutable-cache at the same time? Best in the form of `// TODO append-only:`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +238,242 @@                  // TODO append-only: augment the following defaults for enabling the features for sandbox next
                  enableAppendOnlySchema = false,
                  maxContractStateCacheSize = 0L,
                  maxContractKeyStateCacheSize = 0L,
                  enableMutableContractStateCache = false,
